"Beach Wars!":
"Summer's here! The beach is here and
Xie's here too! Now is the time for
beach-going on Wopal! Yet, perhaps
because of the heat, the Oceanids have
gone wild, and Darkers have suddenly
appeared, leaving our vacation plans in
ruins! We need all ARKS to help take
this beautiful beach back!
――――――――――――――――――――
Fail: Time limit expires"
